fields.Title of Presentation: Multilingual Learners in Rural Areas: Building Relationships through a Child and Community Context Study.
fields.Description/Abstract:
Info

Presentation Topic:
Parental/Family Involvement 

Description:
Although much attention has been devoted to the family-school-partnerships,
relatively little information is known about rural communities with large numbers of
multilingual learners. Most of the research pointing to the relevance and efficacy
of parent involvement and partnership focuses on urban settings (Reynolds, 2000). The
purpose of this study is to examine the relationship between teacher’s level of efficacy
and engagement in a study of child and community context
